remarks: When restricted to complete mappings, the substitution-producing function is one-to-one.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
msubff1.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
msubff1.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
msubff1.s $e |- S = ( mSubst ` T ) $.
msubff1.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
msubff1 $p |- ( T e. mFS -> ( S |` ( R ^m V ) ) : ( R ^m V ) -1-1-> ( E ^m E ) ) $.
